resources.string:
Hello my name is Pacheco.

 This App is a collection of some smaller Apps i have created while getting my app creation skills up to date. I love to make great Apps with a nice User Experience. As of september 2020 this app is made with state of the art technologies. But as you know, you never stop learning.

 Checkout the source code if you like:
 https ://github.com/pachecoberlin/Capstone-Project
